roleset.name: knock out

example.name: passive, one arg
example.text: [Anne Burford, the former EPA chief who resigned under fire in 1983 during a flap with Congress,]-1 was kayoed [*-1] in the confrontation, even though she was never charged with official wrondgoing.
example.arg: even though she was never charged with official wrondgoing

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary kayoed John with a particularly vicious bitchslap.

roleset.note: could also appear as KO or K.O.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'kayo' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, what are you, kidding me?
